data.message:
Humans feel pain 

  Beautiful world, you know very well 
    But our inhibitions to own & sell 
      Has us lost in a waterless well 
             Let the change be felt 
          So all the bad hands dealt 
        Will be smelted into one belt 
              But his needs found 
        Weed and a feed, he's proud 
       Higher then the highest cloud 
     Highest highs establish a crowd 
        That crowds around to shout 
     Out aloud a sound of truth found 
    Boundless bounds bounce about 
    Not a matter of how, but right now 
 About to bounce boundless sounds
      Dissection make proud bowed    
  vowed allowed power around town    
       down around a mound found   
    profound down terms that ground 
           Howls of a dying hound  
          Equal as the circles round 
     Not the inequality of one crown 
  Behind a bunch of political clowns 
      Quaking ground shake downs 
   While our economy breaks downs 
      The link between lost & found 
       Evil will always be under goods
         Clouds as fear is the doubt 
          So scream and shout it out
              Evil is good in a bout 

                Good will prevail 
            Evil will fail as it should 
          For good to reveal the vail 
         Evil will be rained turned hail 
               Frozen stuck broken 
          When falling  from scales 

       Helps good hammer evils nail    
        Combined a grind along rails 
           Entails tales of grand vales 
 No structure, if hammer doesn't nail 
       Be built to broken back down 
   Because we all fail until we prevail 
             To see way out of how 
       Only causes the minds doubt 
       To run about and cloud spouts 
  That reroute what I'm talking bout             
    Struggle of societies round-about
     Sends me  rounds-bouts ......
       Out my fucking mind out loud 
       Loss of doubtful doubt I shout 
        To amount a mounted pounce 
          Spouts of bouts pronounce 
             Beats that bop & bounce 
           Pronounce bouts of spouts 
              That pounce to amount 
            Infinite you can not count 
        But zero is not even a amount 
             It's everything found out 
         A equation of zero in clouds 
              Creates loud sounds 
             Arose from the ground 
     Got some Entrolove on the stove
         Cooked rolled rolling in rows 
                Lows highs time flys 
             No need to ask me why 
    Evil used when need isn't near by

                  Good will prevail 
            Evil will fail as it should 
          For good to reveal the vail 
         Evil will be rained turned hail 
               Frozen stuck broken 
          When falling  from scales 

                   The soul derails 
               Chains of chain-mail 
         Love gives meaning to arise    
          wise devised compromised  
           compromise aligned highs
             Fly buys!    My oh My !
   Teams of dreams seem to gleam      
           Beams of hope streams 
  Places you'd rather be once more     
 Arrived devised surprises surprised    
   Rises divined lined spires inspires      
  Super sized enterprise comprises 
  Souls of fire enquire compromises 
        The heart stained of pain 
   But in his eyes gains are  realised 
       The realness that transpired  
In the pain he used to gain more fire
      To use to warm a cold empire 
            But it's right right, Ight!
             Light the  light to ignite 
              Fights of bright smite       
          Emotes quotes of pure light 
                   Good & evil fight 
  Insightful sight takes a minds fight 
        To search in your inner light
           Found will be your might 
 For good to prevail over evils spike 
   Find what's wrong in what's right 
      Like why daylight turns night 
          Or bouts become fights 
          While living is always life
               To love is to be nice 
               So good I said twice 
               To love is to be nice 
               So good I said twice 
               To love is to be nice 
             Whoops I said it thrice 
           So good will be evils price 

                 Good will prevail 
            Evil will fail as it should 
          For good to reveal the vail 
         Evil will be rained turned hail 
               Frozen stuck broken 
            When falling  from scales
